title: [Large-Scale] Science Practitioner Course for Enhancing Online Collaboration Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Science field practitioners learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can achieve four-level (operational, interactive, managerial, design-oriented) online collaboration competencies using web conferencing tools
Learners can identify and resolve at least three types of collaboration errors (technical errors, communication misunderstandings, role confusion) that occur during science projects
In LMS-based asynchronous collaboration environments, learners can achieve over 80% task completion rates using peer feedback systems
Learners can perform science data sharing and analytical collaboration using smartphone-optimized collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
